    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
In a thrilling encounter at the San Siro, AC Milan edged out Empoli with a close 2-1 victory, delivering a performance replete with moments of brilliance, tenacity, and strategic gameplay. The match kicked off with exuberance, yet saw its fair share of fouls, offsides, and tactical interruptions. Both teams injected fervor and intensity into the contest, culminating in a spectacle of football that kept fans on the edge from start to finish.

The game began with AC Milan initiating the kick-off. Within just 9 seconds, the ball found itself out of play, and once AC Milan executed the throw-in, they quickly faced a foul committed by themselves, marking the first of many interruptions in a tightly contested affair. Empoli took advantage with an indirect free-kick, but soon, AC Milan was responding positively with their own throw-in. The subsequent actions saw a pattern of possession exchanges, fouls, and offsides, a testament to the game's scrappy and competitive nature.

By the fifth minute, Empoli managed to direct their first shot off target, but soon after, a clearance by AC Milan curtailed any further advancements. The game’s rhythm was punctuated by throw-ins and indirect set-pieces that helped both teams in their strategic placement on the pitch. Empoli gained a corner at the 7th minute, yet it resulted in nothing substantial, as the ball went out of play again.

AC Milan, determined to seize the control, registered their first shot off target at the seven-minute mark, signaling their intent to get on the scoreboard. The continuous clearances by Empoli showcased their defensive solidity, while Milan persisted in retrieving the ball, evidenced by frequent throw-ins. The first yellow card of the match came at 26 minutes after Empoli’s foul, underlining the fierce contest that was unfolding.

Eleven minutes into the game, Empoli showed their intent with a shot off target as they battled to make their presence felt. By the 13th minute, Empoli lined up for a corner, but this too went astray, as Milan cleared the threat efficiently. Milan’s own shot on target came in the 15th minute, leading to a successful goal and giving the home side a much-needed lead. Celebrations had barely died down when Empoli retaliated with a goal of their own in the 19th minute, exemplifying their spirit and prowess on the pitch.

Immediately following Empoli’s goal, AC Milan tried to regain momentum. Throw-ins and multiple edge-of-seat moments characterized the game’s pace leading up to half-time. By the 37th minute, Empoli managed to direct a shot on target, but a diligent defense by Milan kept the scores level. Fouls began to interrupt the flow of the game frequently, with Empoli players receiving yellow cards that added to their growing concerns.

As the second half began, Milan introduced a substitution, signaling their intentions to recalibrate and intensify their gameplay. Empoli started the half with the kick-off but quickly found themselves dealing with a Milan-induced foul within the first ten seconds. The pattern from the first half repeated with frequent fouls and tactical free-kicks, illustrating the high stakes and the physical intensity of the match.

An early indirect free-kick by Empoli in the 31st minute of the second half emphasized their aggressive strategy, but attempts to gain an upper hand were matched by Milan’s staunch defensive resistance. Empoli’s persistence was clear with multiple shots on goal, yet Milan’s ability to clear the ball time and again underlined their resolve and defensive organization.

Milan began to assert more control over the proceedings as they attempted to break the deadlock. A significant moment arrived when Milan capitalized on a corner, resulting in a sensational shot on target and an emphatic goal that edged them ahead at 23:07. This proved to be the defining moment as Milan took a decisive lead with nearly half an hour still left on the clock.

Empoli, now trailing, escalated their efforts to pull one back. They won a couple of corners but were unable to convert those opportunities into goals. Tactical substitutions by both sides aimed to inject fresh legs and ideas into their respective strategies. Empoli’s continued struggles with shots off target and robust clearances by Milan stymied any potential comeback.

The final phase of the game saw Empoli grappling with fouls and indirect free-kicks that halted their momentum. Milan adeptly managed the closing minutes with defensive discipline and by winning crucial throw-ins to retain possession. As Empoli's desperation grew, their attempts became more frantic but ultimately unavailing.

In the dying moments of the match, another round of substitutions was observed which underscored the thoroughness of both managers in exploiting every possible tactic. Empoli’s corner towards the end again failed to materialize into an equalizer, as Milan cleared convincingly. The game wound down with Empoli facing repeated offsides and fouls indicating their last-ditch attempts were increasingly desperate.

AC Milan’s hard-fought victory was emblematic of a match that witnessed tactical nous, uncompromising defense, and opportunistic finishing. Both teams displayed a relentless drive, but it was Milan that edged out, powered by their resilient backline and moments of attacking precision. The match served as a reminder of the captivating and unpredictable nature of football—where seconds can tilt the scales, and discipline can win the day.

Empoli’s valiant efforts, marked by several shots both on and off target, reflected their competitiveness and will surely provide them with plenty of takeaways. The match will remain memorable for its varied moments of excitement, strategic depth, and the high-octane tussle embodied in the final scoreline: AC Milan 2-1 Empoli.
